title: Gintama' (2015)
description: The Gintama event at Jump Festa 2015 announced on Sunday that a new television anime series has been green-lit. The new series will premiere on TV Tokyo and its affiliates in April 2015.
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Historical>, <Genre -> Parody>, <Genre -> Samurai>, <Genre -> Sci-Fi>, <Genre -> Shounen>]
